problem.para: Name the six levels of organization of the human body.

solution.para: Chemical, cellular, tissue, organ, organ system, organism.

problem.para: The female ovaries and the male testes are a part of which body system? Can these organs be members of more than one organ system? Why or why not?

solution.para: The female ovaries and the male testes are parts of the reproductive system. But they also secrete hormones, as does the endocrine system, therefore ovaries and testes function within both the endocrine and reproductive systems.
